string.text:
Standard 12 gauge #4 birdshot cheap and abundant. Good for hunting ducks or mutants shot blank. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power (AP): %c[ui_gray_1]None (1 x 100) 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Nominal stopping power (DMG): %c[ui_gray_1]138 (1.38 x 100) 
 
%c[ui_gray_1]SPECIAL:
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Expanding cloud of pellets, short eff. range

Standard 12 gauge #4 birdshot cut to be a slug. The 'Poor Man Slug' is not the best, but better that nothing in the Zone. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power (AP): %c[ui_gray_1]BR1 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Nominal stopping power (DMG): %c[ui_gray_1]High 
 
%c[ui_gray_1]SPECIAL:
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] A fused cluster of birdshot, medium eff. range
